column4: I just installed 10.10 amd64 on a computer that had a dead 10.04 with grub issues.  The installation, it hung while running 'update-grub' and I had to reboot it.  It now works but I'm wondering if I should be concerned about future issues.
did you try  running   sudo update-grub2   again?
Yes, I did that after moving the offending /boot out of the way.
